img.name: Image

arguments.type: (optional) Request an image of a specific mood or tone. For a list of types, try '!img help' or '!img types'.

img.description: Request an image from my personal collection.

hail.name: Summon Users

arguments.user_mention: The user(s) you wish to summon to the current channel mentioned with @ notation.

hail.description: Summon a user (or group of users) to your current channel.

ring.name: Ring
ring.description: Summon me to your current channel. If I can hear you, I will respond.

gorilla.name: Ancient Text Reading
gorilla.description: Request a reading of the ancient texts.

greet.name: Greeting
greet.description: Request a personal greeting from yours truly.

arguments.command: (optional) The specific command you would like to know more about.

mp.name: Meme Points

arguments.me/<@mention>: (optional) Guild member for whom stats will be displayed.

mp.description: Displays statistics from the server's MemePoints record.
